>
> Sheesh Lauren, pedantic doesn't even cover it...
>

Yep - I tend to be that way - hence the warning. But when someone asks a
very general question, and it is not clear how much they want answered,
I
think it better to try to cover the bases rather than to give a skimpy
answer. Not that your answer wasn't skimpy, but some of the others
seemed to
be - so I used your post as a jumping off point.

Besides, I'm bored - unemployment does that to you.


FWIW,
Lauren
